body:
# Projects

## Scientific

### Modeling spatial-frequency tuned channels in visual search and attention

Used steerable pyramids to decompose images into basis sets of orientation energy at multiple spatial frequencies

Methods included: multi-scale filter banks, Bayesian inference, randomization tests, large-scale simulations

### Assessing neurological integrity using eye movement measurements

Designed and patented medical device based on eye movements using temporal calibration and periodic stimuli

Methods included: time-series analysis, spectral decomposition, simulations, signal detection theory

### Detecting neurological anomalies using whole-brain recordings of people watching movies

Characterized typical and some atypical patterns of neural activity in response to rich, multi-modal stimuli

Methods included: Components analysis (PCA, ICA and CCA), dimensionality reduction, pattern recognition

### Functional connectivity analysis of pathways between prefrontal, parietal and occipital cortex

Correlated spectral energy of neural activity to determine pathways underlying memory and attention

Methods included: time-series modeling with seed selection, simulations, general linear models

### Computational modeling of neuro-imaging data to dissociate cognitive roles played by primary visual cortex

Applied advanced regression methods to extract differential neural signals for memory and attention

Methods included: multivariate linear regression, deconvolution, bootstrapping, false discovery rate

## Extra


### Distinguishing between hotspots and bots using internet ad impressions data

Used patterns in ad impression data to support automated real-time methods for online ad placement

Methods included: iterative modeling, anomaly detection, variance

### Data Pirates (@scienceandthedata)

Analyzing funding trends in neuroscience 

### Kaggle challenge: Galaxy Zoo

Combined methods from psychology, image processing and machine learning to classify galaxies

Methods included: k-means clustering, neural networks, logistic regression, support vector machines
